message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority!
I'll take a bit more, but still a fair split!
I'm not budging, you're getting a small share!
I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not going down to 1000!

You're out of options, take the last crumbs!
